entry.title: what a pair 👑s 👇 is how it's done
entry.summary:
what a pair 👑s 👇 is how it's done
Doc™: @tonykipkemboi and I took 1st & 2nd place at the @streamr Hackathon hosted by @developer_dao Exactly 48 hours later... -We've combined our tech -Wrote a Whitepaper -Wrote a Grant Proposal -Shot a Founders Intro Video And now we're applying to @ycombinator.

entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens At ETH Denver one of the biggest challenges devs had was simply getting mobile wallet SDKs to actually work as intended.
